OOC: Yes, try to figure this out too!
::D::

     D was in his new undergro=
und lair, napping in a dirt chair that he made.  He was thinking in his hea=
d of names to call his new faction.  D was living a happy, secret life.  Bu=
t everyday, he was plotting revenge on all other transformers, and was comi=
ng up with new things and tools to help him do so, everyday.  His robotic e=
n-slaving worms were updated, ever since D stole DNA from the whale that at=
e him.....He smiled, then continued trying to nap.
